Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI feedback mostly just involved technical, while teacher helped me to actually understand what I was supposed to do and directly related to the subject that I was learning

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher made me feel more encouraged
